longDescription: This project involved designing and programming a highly optimized, fast autonomous line follower. The core challenge was implementing efficient sensor data acquisition and control logic suitable for high-speed performance on complex tracks. It successfully utilized advanced PID control algorithms to maintain trajectory at maximum velocity.

title: Maze Solver Robot
description: Built an autonomous robot capable of navigating and solving maze paths. Developed navigation algorithms and sensor-based decision logic for real-time movement.
longDescription: The Maze Solver Robot is an autonomous vehicle designed to find the shortest path from a starting point to the center of a maze. It relies on a combination of ultrasonic and infrared sensors for wall detection and distance measurement. The internal logic implements popular algorithms like Wall Follower or Flood Fill to guarantee a solution.

It required rigorous system testing to ensure reliability and compliance with international competition rules.

title: Automatic Plant Watering System
description: Designed an automated irrigation system based on soil moisture sensing, implementing control logic for efficient water usage.
achievements: ðŸ¥‰ 3rd place at the MADA ROBOT CONTEST
longDescription: Addressing the need for sustainable agriculture, this automated plant watering system monitors soil moisture levels in real-time. When humidity dips below a defined threshold, the microcontroller activates a localized water pump, ensuring optimal hydration without water waste.

title: Smart Greenhouse Control System
description: Developed an ESP32-based smart greenhouse controller utilizing a fuzzy logic control system for adaptive environmental regulation (Temperature, Soil moisture, Air humidity, Lighting). Features multi-sensor data acquisition, real-time actuator control, and a web-based dashboard.
longDescription: A comprehensive IoT solution for agricultural environment control. Powered by an ESP32, the system reads data from multiple specialized sensors (Temperature, Soil moisture, Air humidity, and lighting levels). Instead of simple thresholds, it utilizes a Fuzzy Logic control system to make nuanced decisions, activating fans, heaters, or pumps proportionately to maintain ideal growing conditions. Data is logged and accessible via a responsive web dashboard.
